author: slava77
body:
- move caloTowers plotting to a separate method 
- add a plot for PFTowers (present in heavyIons workflows only); triggered by changes in cms-sw/cmssw#29948 
- bugifx mass2 method name, should be massSqr (since ever)

no changes are expected in the reco comparisons summaries
title: reco comparisons: update in caloTowers
